name: Titanium.UI.iOS.StatusBar
summary: A set of constants for the status bar style.

constants.name: ANIMATION_STYLE_FADE
constants.summary: Fade animation style, when the status bar is hidden or shown.
constants.description: One of the group of status bar animation style constants ANIMATION_STYLE_NONE, ANIMATION_STYLE_SLIDE, and ANIMATION_STYLE_FADE.

constants.name: ANIMATION_STYLE_NONE
constants.summary: No animation style, when the status bar is hidden or shown.
constants.description: One of the group of status bar animation style constants ANIMATION_STYLE_NONE, ANIMATION_STYLE_SLIDE, and ANIMATION_STYLE_FADE.

constants.name: ANIMATION_STYLE_SLIDE
constants.summary: Slide animation style, when the status bar is hidden or shown.
constants.description: One of the group of status bar animation style constants ANIMATION_STYLE_NONE, ANIMATION_STYLE_SLIDE, and ANIMATION_STYLE_FADE.

constants.name: DARK_CONTENT
constants.summary: Status bar style to use with light backgrounds.

constants.name: DEFAULT
constants.description:
Use with the statusBarStyle property.

One of the group of status bar style constants DEFAULT, GRAY, GREY, LIGHT_CONTENT,

constants.name: GRAY
constants.description:
Use with the statusBarStyle property.

One of the group of status bar style constants DEFAULT, GRAY, GREY, LIGHT_CONTENT,

constants.name: GREY
constants.description:
Alias for GRAY.

Use with the statusBarStyle property.

One of the group of status bar style constants DEFAULT, GRAY, GREY, LIGHT_CONTENT,

constants.name: LIGHT_CONTENT
constants.summary: Status bar style to use with dark backgrounds.
constants.description:
Use with the statusBarStyle property.

One of the group of status bar style constants DEFAULT, GRAY, GREY, LIGHT_CONTENT,
